info.title: Taikun - WebApi
info.description: This Api will be responsible for overall data distribution and authorization.

get.summary: Retrieve access profiles by organization Id
Retrieve all AI credentials for organization
List alerting integrations by profile id
Retrieve all Alerting profiles for organization
List allowed hosts by access profile id

post.summary: Generate reset password token if you forgot password
Refresh bearer token that generated automatically by API

get.summary: Retrieve list of aws cloud credentials
Retrieve list of azure cloud credentials

post.summary: Import backup storage from source project to target project

get.summary: Retrieve a grouped list of billing summaries
Retrieve a list of cloud credentials by organization Id
Retrieve cloud credential details by cloud Id

delete.summary: Remove cloud credential by cloud Id

post.summary: Upgrade projects that auto-upgrade option enabled
Send email to the users about project expiration
Fetch azure flavor prices with euro
Create dns servers for access profile

get.summary: List dn servers by profile id
Retrieve list of google cloud credentials
Retrieve a list of kube configs for project

post.summary: Delete kube config by project id
Download kube config file for user by project Id
Interactive shell for user kube config

get.summary: Retrieve list of kube config role

post.summary: Execute k8s web socket namespaced pod

get.summary: Retrieve a list of k8s config map for all namespaces

post.summary: Add a new organization. Only available for admins.

get.summary: Retrieve all data about current organization by Id

delete.summary: Delete the specified organization. Only available for admins.

post.summary: Create prometheus dashboard pre defined query
Update prometheus dashboard pre defined query

get.summary: et list of pre defined common prometheus dashboard elements
Get list of pre defined organization prometheus dashboard elements

delete.summary: Delete prometheus dashboard pre defined query

get.summary: Retrieve all project apps according to current organization
Retrieve list of Project groups by user group id for dropdown
Retrieve list of projects by project group id

put.summary: Update project revision by ProjectId for poller

get.summary: Retrieve project template by organization Id

put.summary: Update project by Id for poller
Update health status of the project by Id
Change the project status for the given project. Only available for admin.

post.summary: Commit changes for the given project. The changes will then be applied and the project will be updated. The project must be in the READY state.
Delete the project. The project must be empty (no server) and in READY state
Delete whole project by project Id
Purge a list of servers from project by project Id
Purge a whole project by project Id
Upgrade the project's Kubernetes to the next available version. Project must be READY.

get.summary: Retrieve details of the project by Id
Retrieve list of projects for dropdown
Retrieve a list of projects for billing
Retrieve a list of projects for poller. Only available for admins.
Retrieve a list of projects for alert poller. Only available for admins.
Retrieve a list of grouped prometheus billing
Retrieve all prometheus rules with detailed info
Retrieve a list of prometheus rules

post.summary: Update proxmox network used ip addresses

get.summary: Retrieve list of proxmox cloud credentials

List stand alone security group by profile id

post.summary: Console screenshot or terminal access for server
Create a new server in the given project.

get.summary: Retrieve all servers by given project
Retrieve all slack configs for organization

post.summary: Create a new vm in the given project.

Retrieve details of the project by Id

get.summary: Retrieve all standalone profiles for organization

Bearer.description: Input your Bearer token in this format - Bearer {your token here} to access this API
Bearer.name: Authorization
